New Records: The Cavs' 9-0 start to the 2024-25 season is the best in franchise history, surpassing any start during LeBron James' tenure.
Key Match Events: The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 131-122 on the road.
The Cavs made 17 three-pointers as a team, with significant contributions from Sam Merrill, Georges Niang, and Caris LeVert off the bench.
Post-Match Reflections: The Cavs' role players have been phenomenal, and the team hopes to remain healthy and maintain their strong start.
The 9-0 start indicates that the Cavs should be considered serious championship contenders.
